abstract.t: This document describes a data format, the Lightweight PresenceInformation Data Format (LPIDF) for conveying presence information.The format is based on RFC822 encoding of presence data. In fact,this encoding is exactly identical to the encoding used by theSession Initiation Protocol (SIP) in its registration messages. Thissimplifies the process of parsing and processing presence data inclients which use SIP for presence or communications services. LPIDFis one instantiation of an abstract presence data model alsodescribed here.
